results.name: Grow fishy - Survive & become a Big Fish
Visk's End of the World Adventure

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Better CPU can reduce lag when accelerating games. Better graphics cards can reduce lag when enabling more effects
